query:
ALTER TABLE evidence_packs 
ADD COLUMN entityId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN entityLegalName VARCHAR(512) NULL,
ADD COLUMN groupId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN groupName VARCHAR(256) NULL,
ADD COLUMN affectedEntityIds TEXT NULL;
